titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts Theses
Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts Theses
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Hannah Rae Montgomery

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 23:01

did.unittitle: Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts Dissertations
did.abstract: The collection consists of dissertations written in partial completion of the requirements for the Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts degree.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Yale School of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts Dissertations, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of dissertations written in partial completion of the requirements for the Yale School of Drama Doctor of Fine Arts degree.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in chronological order by year of completion, then arranged alphabetically by author surname within each year.
